mapper.update: merge into sv_cms_custbase a using (select t.branch_id, max(t.cust_name) as cust_name, t.cert_type, t.cert_no, max(contact_info1) as contact_info1, max(contact_info2) as contact_info2, max(rpt_date) as rpt_date, max(rpt_type) as rpt_type from sv_cls_custinfo t group by t.branch_id, t.cert_type, t.cert_no) b on (a.cert_type = b.cert_type and a.cert_no = b.cert_no) when not matched then insert (guid, branch_id, cust_name, cert_type, cert_no, contact_info1, contact_info2, rpt_date, rpt_type, imp_date) values (sys_guid(), b.branch_id, b.cust_name, b.cert_type, b.cert_no, b.contact_info1, b.contact_info2, b.rpt_date, b.rpt_type, sysdate) where b.rpt_date = #{rptDate} when matched then update set a.contact_info1 = b.contact_info1, a.contact_info2 = b.contact_info2, a.rpt_date = b.rpt_date, a.rpt_type = b.rpt_type, a.imp_date = sysdate where b.rpt_date = #{rptDate} and a.rpt_type = b.rpt_type
update sv_cls_custinfo set cert_type = #{certType} where cert_type is null and rpt_date = #{rptDate}
mapper.insert: insert into ODSB_LARGEDEP_FLOW (SELECT A1.TX_DT, A1.TX_INST_NO, A2.CM_OPUN_FLNM_CHN TX_INST_NAME, A1.INST_NO, A3.CM_OPUN_FLNM_CHN INST_NAME, A1.CUST_ACCT_NO, A1.CUST_NO, A1.CUST_NAME, A1.SA_OP_BANK_NO, A1.SA_OP_ACCT_NO, A1.SA_OP_CUST_NAME, A1.DR_CR_COD, A1.CR_TX_AMT, A1.BUSI_TYPE, A1.SUMMARY, A1.TX_TYPE, A1.XT_OP_TRL FROM (SELECT A.SA_TX_DT AS TX_DT, A.BUS_INST_NO AS TX_INST_NO, B.INST_NO, A.CUST_ACCT_NO, A.CUST_NO, B.CUST_NAME, A.SA_OP_BANK_NO, A.SA_OP_ACCT_NO_32 SA_OP_ACCT_NO, A.SA_OP_CUST_NAME, A.DR_CR_COD, A.CR_TX_AMT, '活期' BUSI_TYPE, A.SA_RMRK_DESC SUMMARY, A.XT_OP_TRL, (SELECT G.SOURCE_CD_DESC from BF_CM_STD_CODE G where G.CATEGORY_CD='EVE0100027' AND G.Ods_Standard_Cd=A.TX_TYPE ) TX_TYPE FROM BF_EVT_DEP_SAP A LEFT JOIN BF_AGT_DEP_ACCT_SAP B ON A.ACCT_NO = B.ACCT_NO AND A.CURR_CD = B.CURR_CD AND A.CURR_IDEN = B.CURR_IDEN WHERE A.EC_FLG = '0' AND A.SA_TX_DT >= #{startDate} and A.CR_TX_AMT >= 50000 UNION ALL SELECT C.CR_TX_DT TX_DT, C.TD_OPUN_COD TX_INST_NO, D.INST_NO, C.CUST_ACCT_NO, C.CUST_NO, D.CUST_NAME, '' SA_OP_BANK_NO, '' SA_OP_ACCT_NO, '' SA_OP_CUST_NAME, SUBSTR(C.DR_CR_COD, 2, 1) DR_CR_COD, C.CR_TX_AMT, '定期' BUSI_TYPE, (select PQNR from BF_CM_SUMMARY E where E.DSCRP_COD=C.SUMMARY) DR_CR_COD, C.TD_OPR_NO XT_OP_TRL, (SELECT F.SOURCE_CD_DESC from BF_CM_STD_CODE F where F.CATEGORY_CD='EVE0100027' AND F.Ods_Standard_Cd=C.TX_TYPE) TX_TYPE FROM BF_EVT_DEP_TDP C LEFT JOIN BF_AGT_DEP_ACCT_TDP D ON C.ACCT_NO = D.ACCT_NO AND C.CURR_IDEN = D.CURR_IDEN AND C.CURR_CD = D.CURR_CD WHERE C.EC_FLG = '0' AND C.CR_TX_DT >= #{startDate} and C.CR_TX_AMT >= 50000 ) A1 LEFT JOIN BF_PR_BR_INSTN A2 ON A2.OPR_UNIT_CD = A1.TX_INST_NO LEFT JOIN BF_PR_BR_INSTN A3 ON A3.OPR_UNIT_CD = A1.INST_NO)

insert into ODSB_ST_TCONFIRM_TRAD ( SELECT t3.CUST_NAME 投资人姓名 ,t3.CERT_NO 证件号码 ,t3.SECUR_CORD 证券卡号 ,t3.CAPI_ACCOUNT 资金帐号 ,t2.FUND_ACCT_NO 基金帐号 ,t1.FUND_CD 基金代码 ,t3.CUST_CITY_ACCNT 转账签约帐号 ,t1.D_CDATE 确认日期 ,t1.D_DATE 交易申请日期 ,t1.F_CONFIRMBALANCE 确认金额 ,t1.F_CONFIRMSHARES 确认份额 ,t3.CARD_DATE 卡建立日期 ,t3.CUST_OPEN_DT 开户日期 ,t3.CUST_OPEN_NODE 开户网点 ,t2.TSBN 证券网点编号 ,sys_guid() guid FROM BF_EVT_NIN_ST_TCONFIRM_TRAD@odsbptdb t1,BF_AGT_NIN_ST_TACCOINFO@odsbptdb t2,BF_AGT_NIN_ST_TA_SEC_CARD@odsbptdb t3 WHERE t1.Fund_Acct_No=t2.Fund_Acct_No AND t2.Secur_Cord=t3.Secur_Cord AND t1.D_CDATE >= #{startDate} )

insert into ODSB_CHN_TRAD ( select sys_guid() guid, t.* from (select t2.SIGN_INSTN as 开通签约服务机构, t1.CUST_NAME as 姓名, t1.CERT_TYPE as 证件类型, t1.CERT_NO as 证件号码, t2.SIGN_DT as 开通签约服务日期, t1.VC_MOBILENO as 手机号码, t2.ENTRY_TMS as 登录次数, t3.total as 交易笔数, case t2.AUTH_TYPE when 'A' then '动态口令卡' when 'B' then '短信动态口令' when 'N' then 'UKEY+短信动态口令' when 'C' then '证书方式' when 'E' then '动态口令卡' when 'U' then 'Ukey' when 'F' then 'Ukey＋动态口令卡' when 'L' then '动态令牌' when 'H' then 'Ukey＋动态令牌' when 'T' then '广东行CCI的CTS客户' when 'S' then 'UKEY＋二次短信确认' when 'R' then '刮刮卡+短信动态口令' when 'O' then '高端版二代网银盾' when 'D' then '二代网银盾' else '其它' end as 客户签约类型, t3.CHN_NO, t1.ECTIP_CUST_NO, t1.DCC_CUSTNO from BF_PR_IND_INFO_ECTIP t1, BF_AGT_CHN_CHNP_CUST t2, (select ECTIP_CUST_NO, CHN_NO, count(*) as total from BF_EVT_CHN_CHN_TRAD where FLAT_TRAD_DT >= #{startDate} and CHN_NO in ('01','02') and AMT1 > '0' and ECTIP_CUST_NO in (select ECTIP_CUST_NO from BF_AGT_CHN_CHNP_CUST where SIGN_DT >= #{startDate}) group by ECTIP_CUST_NO, CHN_NO) t3 where t1.ECTIP_CUST_NO = t2.ECTIP_CUST_NO and t1.ECTIP_CUST_NO = t3.ECTIP_CUST_NO and t2.SIGN_DT >= #{startDate} group by t2.SIGN_INSTN, t1.CUST_NAME, t1.CERT_NO, t2.SIGN_DT, t1.VC_MOBILENO, t2.ENTRY_TMS, t3.total, t2.AUTH_TYPE, t1.CERT_TYPE, t3.CHN_NO, t1.ECTIP_CUST_NO, t1.DCC_CUSTNO )t )
